member.name: P:FreeTextBoxControls.FreeTextBox.ToolbarLayout
member.summary: A string of buttons used to create the toolbar. Use commas (,) to separate items. A semicolon (;) will insert a separator and a pipe (|) will start a new Toolbar. Possible values are ParagraphMenu, FontFacesMenu, FontSizesMenu, FontForeColorsMenu, FontForeColorPicker, FontBackColorsMenu, FontBackColorPicker, Bold, Italic, Underline, Strikethrough, Superscript, Subscript;InsertImageFromGallery, CreateLink, Unlink, RemoveFormat, JustifyLeft, JustifyRight, JustifyCenter, JustifyFull;BulletedList, NumberedList, Indent, Outdent, Cut, Copy, Paste, Delete;Undo, Redo, Print, Save, ieSpellCheck, StyleMenu, SymbolsMenu, InsertHtmlMenu, InsertRule, InsertDate, InsertTime, WordCount

member.summary: Sets the style for the scrollbar

member.name: P:FreeTextBoxControls.FreeTextBox.ToolbarType
member.summary: Sets the style for how the toolbar is draw.

member.name: P:FreeTextBoxControls.FreeTextBox.ButtonStyle
member.summary: Style parameters for ToolbarButtons. Is unused if ButtonType is set to FormButton. If ToolbarType is manually set, these values may be overridden. You should set ToolbarType to ToolbarType.Custom when customizing ButtonStyle

member.name: P:FreeTextBoxControls.FreeTextBox.ButtonType
member.summary: Determines how buttons are displayed. Image is the default type.

member.name: P:FreeTextBoxControls.FreeTextBox.ButtonOverStyle
member.summary: Boolean for whether buttons change style (borders and back color) onMouseOver.

member.name: P:FreeTextBoxControls.FreeTextBox.ButtonOverImage
member.summary: Boolean for whether buttons change images onMouseOver.

member.name: P:FreeTextBoxControls.FreeTextBox.ButtonDownStyle
member.summary: Boolean for whether buttons change style (borders and back color) onMouseDown.

member.name: P:FreeTextBoxControls.FreeTextBox.ButtonDownImage
member.summary: Boolean for whether buttons change images onMouseDown.

member.name: P:FreeTextBoxControls.FreeTextBox.ButtonPath
member.summary: The path to button images. Defaults to String.Empty, but is set but ButtonStyle

member.name: P:FreeTextBoxControls.FreeTextBox.ButtonFileExtention
member.summary: The file type extention of buttons (gif,jpg,png)

member.name: P:FreeTextBoxControls.FreeTextBox.HelperFilesPath
member.summary: The path to helper files. Default is blank which will look in the current directory. Automatically affixes a "/" if it's not included.

member.name: P:FreeTextBoxControls.FreeTextBox.HelperFilesParameters
member.summary: Parameters included with all helper scripts

member.name: P:FreeTextBoxControls.FreeTextBox.ImageGalleryPath
member.summary: The path to for the InsertImageFromGallery Button. Defaults to "images". Use forward slashes "/" and do not all leading or trailing slashes.
